original_text:
And the peoples will be as if burned to lime,
    like thorns cut down, that are burned in the fire.”
korean_text: 민족들은 불에 굽는 횟돌 같겠고 잘라서 불에 사르는 가시나무 같으리로다

sentences.original_text: And the peoples will be as if burned to lime
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 민족들은 석회처럼 타 버릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that are burned in the fire
